auth.subject: Accept Sign In Request
lines: Hi,
We received a request to sign into your account.
If this is you click the link below to accept the sign in.
If you are not sure and decide not to click it no one will gain access to your account.
Accept Sign In Request.

article_draft_published.subject: Article published: "{{ ARTICLE_DRAFT_TITLE }}"
lines: Hi,
The article {{ ARTICLE_DRAFT_TITLE }} written by {{ AUTHOR_NAME }} for {{ PUBLISHER_NAME }} has been approved and it's now available to read.
You can see it here.

article_draft_rejected.subject: Article draft rejected: "{{ ARTICLE_DRAFT_TITLE }}"
lines: Hi,
We are sorry to say that the article draft {{ ARTICLE_DRAFT_TITLE }} written by {{ AUTHOR_NAME }} for {{ PUBLISHER_NAME }} has been rejected with the following reason:
{{ REASON }}
You can edit this draft here and re-submit it when done.

author_invite.subject: You've been invited to be an author for "{{ PUBLISHER_NAME }}"
lines: Hi,
You've been invited to be an author for the publisher {{ PUBLISHER_NAME }}.
To accept the invite go to your account settings and then click the "Accept" button.

author_invite_no_user.subject: You've been invited to be an author for "{{ PUBLISHER_NAME }}"
lines: Hi,
You've been invited to be an author for the publisher {{ PUBLISHER_NAME }}.
To accept the invite follow these steps:
<ol>
• Create a nuntium account
• Go to your account settings and then click the "Accept" button
The nuntium team
